venue.name: Boston Common by the Frog Pond

item.description:
Event: Practice your double axels and triple salchows during an evening of ice skating on Frog Pond. Or just have fun skating around the pond.  This is a beautiful place to skate after it gets dark and the Pond always has a fun crowd of people to enjoy the ice with. When the skating is over we intend to go some place and relax over hot cocoa.

Contact: Heather

Meet: At Frog Pond at Boston Common, near the Boylston Street and Park Street MBTA stations.  We'll meet at the skate rental area.

RSVP: By Dec 5. so we can make the arrangements for finding each other on the 7th.

Cost: The entrance fee is $5 and skate rentals are $9. There is a $5 charge for Meetups participants and guests which can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of $25.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP and we can make the arrangements

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: An evening of Ice Skating in Boston Commons
